name: ScyllaNinja
description: Automatically inject ScyllaHide anti-anti-debug DLL when debugging Windows executables
longdescription:
Binary Ninja integration for [ScyllaHide](https://github.com/x64dbg/ScyllaHide) by x64dbg. Automatically injects the ScyllaHide DLL when the debugger hits the initial breakpoint, helping bypass common anti-debugging techniques.

**Setup:**
1. Download ScyllaHide binaries from https://github.com/x64dbg/ScyllaHide/releases/tag/v1.4
2. Extract InjectorCLI (x86/x64) and HookLibrary DLLs (x86/x64)
3. Configure directory in Settings > Debugger > ScyllaHide
4. Select a profile and start debugging

ScyllaHide handles PEB manipulation, NT API hooking, and timing protection to hide the debugger from anti-debug checks.

installinstructions.Windows:
1. Install plugin via Binary Ninja Plugin Manager or copy to plugins directory
2. Download ScyllaHide from https://github.com/x64dbg/ScyllaHide/releases/tag/v1.4
3. Extract InjectorCLIx64.exe, InjectorCLIx86.exe, HookLibraryx64.dll, HookLibraryx86.dll
4. Set ScyllaHide directory in Settings > Debugger > ScyllaHide
5. Restart Binary Ninja
